snippet: Opinion and exit polls have been showing a sharp increase of support in a short time among every age group, including among the baby boomers.
abstract: Opinion and exit polls across the country are increasingly showing a sharp increase in support for same-sex marriage among every age group, including largest voting group, baby boomers; one reason behind the surge that is evident from polls is that there is a marked increase in the number of people of all ages who know gay men and lesbians.
